title: Violin Concerto No. 3 (Haydn)
text:
The Violin Concerto No. 3 in A major (Hob. VIIa/3) ("Melker Konzert") was composed by Joseph Haydn probably between 1765 and 1770.


== References ==
Notes
SourcesThomas, Günter. Preface (PDF). Concerto for Violin and Orchestra A major Hob. VIIa:3. By Haydn, Joseph.  Lohmann, Heinz (ed.).  (in German, English, and French). G. Henle Verlag. Archived from the original (PDF) on 2011-07-18.
